links.*: Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[15 January|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is [[1957 "Carnival of Books" Interview|interviewed]] by Ruth Harshaw for the NBC radio program "Carnival of Books".
==February==
* '''[[3 February|3]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 195a]].
==March==
* '''[[1 March|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 195b]].
* '''[[21 March|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 196]].
==April==
* '''[[9 April|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mr Hayward|a letter to Mr Hayward]].
* '''[[23 April|23]]''' - Poet [[Roy Campbell]] dies.
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 196a]].
==May==
*'''[[7 May|7]]''' - Tolkien visits [[Cambridge]] to view the ''Ancrene Wisse'' manuscript.
* '''[[9 May|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 197]].
==June==
* '''[[7 June|7]]''' - [[Marquette University]] acquires many of [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s manuscripts for 1,500 pounds.
* '''[[9 June|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to William Ready (9 June 1957)|a letter to William Ready]].
* '''[[24 June|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 199]].
* '''[[25 June|25]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 200]].
* '''[[26 June|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Deirdre Levinson (26 June 1957)|a letter to Deirdre Levinson]].

==August==
* '''[[5 August|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letters to Jerome W. Archer|two letters to Jerome W. Archer]], Director of Libraries at [[Marquette University]].
* '''[[21 August|21]]''' - Artist [[John Howe]] is born.
* '''[[24 August|24]]''' - Actor [[Stephen Fry]] is born.
* '''[[25 August|25]]''' - Author [[Ian Brodie]] is born.
==September==
* '''[[2 September|2]]''' - Professor [[William Craigie]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s predecessor as [[Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon]], dies.
* '''[[4 September|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 200a]].
* '''[[7 September|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 201]].
* '''[[10 September|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wins the [[The Bookseller, 14 September 1957|International Fantasy Award]].
* '''[[11 September|11]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[letter 202]].
* '''[[11 September|11]]''' - The [[Oxford Mail, 11 September 1957|''Oxford Mail'']] reports from the International Fantasy Award, won by Tolkien.
* '''[[14 September|14]]''' - [[The Bookseller, 14 September 1957|''The Bookseller'']] reports from the International Fantasy Award, won by Tolkien.
==October==
* '''?''' - Scholar [[Christopher Mitchell]] is born. 
==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - Actor [[Cam Clarke]] is born.
* '''[[9 November|9/10]]''' - At midnight, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (9/10 November 1957)|a letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]].
* '''[[17 November|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 203]].
* '''[[17 November|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (17 November 1957)|a letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]].
==December==
* '''[[7 December|7]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 204]].
* '''[[13 December|13]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 204a]].
==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is awarded the International Fantasy Award.
* '''?''' - [[Anders Stenström]], scholar of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is born.
* '''?''' - Actress [[Lori Dungey]] is born.

{{Years|1954|1955|1956|1957|1958|1959|1960|}}
